sentences.sContent: Words written alike are often pronounced differently.
sentences.sCn: 拼法相同的词往往读音不同。

sentences.sContent: Different lawyers may construe the same law differently.
sentences.sCn: 对同一法律，不同的律师可以做出不同的解释。

sentences.sContent: For me, this uncertainty lies at the heart of what we need to know if we are to understand ourselves and behave differently.
sentences.sCn: 对我而言，这样的不确定性就存在于我们需要去了解的内心，即我们懂得我们自己和行为本身是不同的。

words.tran: 不同的；个别的，与众不同的
